item.title: Top 10 Web-Browser Extensions for Chrome and Firefox
item.description: What is an Extension/Add-on? A browser extension, often referred to as an add-on, is a small software program designed to enhance and customize the functionality of web browsers such as Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari, or Microsoft Edge. These extensions can add new features, modify existing ones, or even block unwanted content. Whether it’s blocking ads for a cleaner browsing experience, managing passwords securely, or accelerating downloads, browser extensions offer users a way to tailor their browsing experience to their needs and preferences.
